item.title: Jennifer add a quote by JRR Tolkein
item.description: "Folk in those stories had lots of chances of turning back, only they didn’t. They kept going. Because they were holding on to something. That there’s some good in this world, Mr. Frodo… and it’s worth fighting for." -- JRR Tolkein

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Will Schwalbe
item.description: "We're all in the end-of-your-life book-club, whether we acknowledge it or not; each book we read may well be the last, each conversation the final one." -- Will Schwalbe

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Will Schwalbe
item.description: "We all owe everyone for everything that happens in our lives. But it's not owing like a debt to one person--it's really that we owe everyone for everything. Our whole lives can change in an instant--so each person that keeps that from happening, no matter how small a role they play, is also responsible for all of it. Just by giving friendship and love, you keep the people around you from giving up--and each expression of friendship or love may be the one that makes all the difference." -- Will Schwalbe

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Will Schwalbe
item.description: "That's one of the things books do. They help us talk. But they also give us something we can all talk about when we don't want to talk about ourselves." -- Will Schwalbe

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Will Schwalbe
item.description: "The greatest gift you can give anyone is your undivided attention..." -- Will Schwalbe

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ted Dekker
item.description: "Prayer may just be the most powerful tool mankind has.” ~Blink" -- Ted Dekker

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ted Dekker
item.description: "The world’s bumper sticker reads: Life sucks, and then you die. Perhaps Christian bumper stickers should read: Life sucks, but then you find hope and you can’t wait to die." -- Ted Dekker
